# `banner` for [default](/commands/categories/default.md)

<div class='command-title'>Print a banner for Nushell with information about the project</div>

## Signature

```> banner {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--short`: Only show startup time


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |
